subject: Order: SSN4716
description_text:
Hi there.
Just received a package yesterday with the motor suports with the original
tracking number being: WNBAA0414803854YQ, but I didn't received the motors
yet (JSELP1220817975YQ).Today, both tracking numbers return as delivered.
Can you help me, is anything wrong? or is just the case of waiting a little
more?

Thank you for your help and happy new year!

conversations.body_text: Hi Daniel Ribeiro,    Don't worry, the haptics and pedals have been shipped together from the German warehouse.    CE326637549DE
